summary:
Clothing (65 outfits) and nude body skins (32 skins) for use by "Player characters" as well as any "potential follower", "potential hireling", Housecarl, or Spouse.
For "Player Character" use, everything is craftable & purchasable.
For NPC use, everything is fully dialoged.
You can now change the s
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][color=yellow]WARNING[/color][/size][b][color=yellow], Requires Skyrim version 1.8 or higher[/color][/b]
[color=green][b]Main files are[/b] [size=3]"100% stand alone"[/size][/color], [b]only the optional files "have requirements"[/b]
(Currently this mod can NOT support beast races due to its "multi body approach", will hopefully change in V3)

While the main file is 100% stand alone, this mod was originaly created to quickly dress and redress the female occupants of....
"Bathing Beauties or Beefcake - Luxury Suite" v5.0 by Migal130
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11427]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11427[/url]
and/or
"Underground Bathhouse - Standalone by Andragon"
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27361]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27361[/url]
Files for these mods can be found in my optional files section.

On a side note: If you like a mod, any mod, please come back to endorse it. Appreciation is a wonderfull motivator for modders.

[b]Summer Wear for BBLS. V2.0[/b]
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/25237-1-1357703372.jpg[/img]

[b]Description:[/b]
This mod includes clothing and nude body skins for use By both "Player characters" as well as any "potential follower", "potential hireling", Housecarl, or Spouse.

For use on "Player characters", everything is both craft able, and purchasable.
For use on NPC's" everything is fully dialoged. Just ask them "Do you have any Summerwear?" and then tell them what you want them to wear.
[b]This means you can now change the "skin" of individual NPC's, and/or your player character, from inside the game.
You no longer will be forced to have everyone wearing the "same skin" on the "same body".[/b]
Available in "full" Resolution (with textures up to 4k), and "Light" resolution (with textures caped at 2k)

[size=5]Useage:[/size] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/articles/782/][size=4]Please see full article[/size][/url]

[b]Mod Contents:[/b]
11 basic outfits, 14 if you count the variants. Most are available in at least 5 colors, [b]There are 65 outfits total.[/b]
All the outfits have been dialoged to be used on NPCs.
All the outfits are craft able at any "Summer Wear Loom". instead of "Forge", for use on the players character.
All the outfits are Purchasable from "Gnoper Viloc or Sukque"

4 basic Bodies, 8 if you count the variants. Each is available in at least 4 skins, [b]So 32 skins total.[/b]
All the skins have been dialoged to be used on BBLS NPCs. (and WILL not be removed by the pools or beds, my thanks to migal for this.)
All the skins are craft able at "SUMMER WEAR Loom" instead of "Forge", for use on the players character.
All the skins are Purchasable from "Gnoper Viloc or Sukque"

21 sets of CBBE hands and 16 Feet (plain, pink, red, green, violet or blue nail polish, with White tips, dark tips, or checkerboard)
4 sets of UNP hands and Feet (plain, and with pink, red, or green nail polish)(additional UNP hands & feet are comeing soon)
All the hands and feet are craft able at "SUMMER WEAR Loom" instead of "Forge", for use on the players character.
All the hands and feet are Purchasable from "Gnoper Viloc or Sukque"

8 Necklaces, in case you have any neck seems you need to hide.
All the Necklaces are craft able at "SUMMER WEAR Loom" instead of "Forge", for use on the players character.
All the Necklaces are Purchasable from "Gnoper Viloc or Sukque"

6 Sets of Sandles (for CBBE)
5 Panties (for CBBE)
1 Teddybear Shield

[b]The Vendors:[/b]
"Gnoper Viloc & Sukque" can be found inside the "Honningbrew Meadery".
Sukque Will always be there (unless you have installed 1 or more of the Optional esps)
Gnoper Villoc (a creepy old guy) can be found at Fralias market stall in Whiterun (outside the "Bannered Mare" inn)
From around 8:30 PM untill 6:30 AM nightly
They sell: every skin, every clothing, and materials required for crafting of the same. So Player Characters can also wear these items.
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/25237-1-1357704298.jpg[/img]
[b]Planned additions:[/b]
None at this time.

[b]Change log:[/b]
V2.0
Changed the Inventory/Crafting/Vendor Models to Ultra Low Textures (512x512), to prevent crashes during scrolling through those lists.
Crafting is now done at any "Summer Wear Loom", Locations are..@ meadery, in second room turn left (always there), Across the street from BBLS (If either optional ESP is used)
Dialogs now work on any "Potential Follower", "Current Follower", "Potential Hireling", Houscarl, or Spouse.
Fixed the lighting issue with some clothing going black, near fireplaces.
Fixed the positioning of the "bodys" and "hands"/"feet" in the Crafting/Vendor lists.
(If optional ESP is used)...In UBH, The "Bikini A", & "WW Bikinis" have been designed to NOT strip off at poolside (they still come off in pool)
(If optional ESP is used)...In UBH, The "Butterfly Fishnets", & "Lacy Camies" have been designed to NOT strip off in beds.
(If optional ESP is used)...In both UBH and BBLS the "skins" wont strip off anywhere. (and anything worn with the skins such as panties, sanles, and necklaces)
Added 4 Armors (1 hide, 3 bandit)
Added Butterfly Fishnets, in 5 colors (designed to not strip in UBH beds)
Added Lacy Camies, in 5 colors (designed to not strip in UBH beds)
Added Knit Dresses, in 5 colors (My first "clean" outfit, and hopefully last, lol)
Added 5 "Separate" Panties, available to be added to any CBBE outfit, including the CBBE "skins". (except bikinis, would not make any sense to have that)
Added 8 "Separate" Necklaces, available to be added to any outfit.
Added 6 "Separate" Sandals, available to be added to any CBBE outfit. (Sandals have been removed from bikini outfits that used to come with them)

V 1.5
All CBBE skins upgraded to Calientes new amazing v3.2 meshes and texures.
All Sandals now have "toes", thanks to Caliente.
Added 17 more variations of CBBE finger nail polish. 21 total (Additional UNP Variations will be coming later)
Added 12 more variations of CBBE toe nail polish. 16 total (Additional UNP Variations will be coming later)
v 1.0
Initial release.

[b]Required Files:[/b]
[color=green]for Main Mod...[b]NONE [/b][/color]
(If optional ESPs are used)
"Bathing Beauties or Beefcake - Luxury Suite" v5.0 by Migal130
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11427]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11427[/url]
and/or
"Underground Bathhouse - Standalone by Andragon"
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27361]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27361[/url]

[size=5]Installation:[/size] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/articles/783/][size=4]Please see full article[/size][/url]
NOTE:When Upgading from the older v1.0 to the new v2.0
It is [b][color=red]critical[/color][/b] that "BBLSSummerWear.esp" be removed.
Best is to install via NMM,
But for manual install;
Extract the Contents of the "Data" folder to, your skyrimData directory, (typically, C:ProgramfilesSteamSteamAppscommonskyrimData)
Insure SummerWear.ESM and SummerWearSA.ESP, are turned on.

[b]Uninstallation:[/b]
Best is to remove via NMM,
but for manual uninstall Remove;
SummerWear.ESM, SummerWearSA.ESP from skyrimData
the folder skyrimDatameshesclothesRIP88
the folder skyrimDatameshesactorscharacterfacegendatafacegeomBBLSSummerWear.esp
the folder skyrimDatameshesactorscharacteraltbody (leave this folder in, if you also use "BBLSMotseerOutfits", we share these files to save you hard drive space)
the folder skyrimDatameshesarmorRIP88
the folder skyrimDatatexturesclothesRIP88
the folder skyrimDatatexturesactorscharacterfacegendatafacegeomBBLSSummerWear.esp
the folder skyrimDatatexturesactorscharacteraltbody (leave this folder in, if you also use "BBLSMotseerOutfits", we share these files to save you hard drive space)
the folder skyrimDatatexturesarmorRIP88
remove from skyrimDatascripts...any files with names that start with "RIP_TIF__"
remove from skyrimDataSEQ "SummerWear.seq"

[b]Known Issues:[/b]
(Currently this mod can NOT support beast races due to its "multi body approach", will hopefully change in V3)
These outfits are highly dependant on alpha transparencies, some ENB's may cause problems, for some users.

[b]Incompatibilities:[/b]
Beauty mods that change the skin tone of the heads,
Custom races that change the skin tone of the heads.

[size=5]F.A.Q. [/size][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/articles/784/] [size=4]Please see full article[/size][/url]

[b]Tools Used:[/b]
Photoshop
Nifscope
TESvsnip
TES5Edit
Creation Kit

[b][b]Permissions:
Anyone is free to use anything that I have made forÂ NON COMERCIAL use ONLY.
However, most of my work is based in some way off a stock Bethesda mesh or texture, so keep it in this game please.
Many of the assets in this file are NOT mine but are used by permission so please contact me before attempting to use any assets from this mod.
Credits to those I have credited should be passed forward, of course. If using just parts, you can contact me for what credits should be passed on with what parts.

Nobody may upload my mod to any other sites, Repackage and claim it as their work, Profit from the use of "the mod in whole" or any of its assets, or restrict others from using ("their works" "based on my parts"). its just a game folks, lets keep it fun.[/b][/b]
